title: The Log raft: a Norwegian summer story
creator_credit: Svekon Films, Karin Sandberg and Sverre Sandberg
brief_description: Three young children spend the summer at their island cabin at the fjords. Their love of nature makes their experience universal but their curiosity leads to some dramatic moments. A strange surreal quality film with excellent close-up photography.
